title: Thresh Pumpkin Carving
body:
Also lit in green
https://i.imgur.com/3mXoXuk.jpg

The artwork was done by Esmeekramer on Deviantart, and I received permission to use it, it can be found [here](https://esmeekramer.deviantart.com/art/Tribal-Thresh-496715754). I somehow manage to draw bad stick figures, the art's all her. I just transferred it to a pumpkin and carved it.

It took about 11.5 hours start to finish.

Original Artwork:
https://esmeekramer.deviantart.com/art/Tribal-Thresh-496715754

EDIT: add the pic of him lit in green

replies.body: 11 hours?! Holy crap, that's some serious dedication. You nailed the design! <3
Thanks! <3 He almost didn't have a scythe, it was hell bent on collapsing and i was like "oh good god, what have i started ._.". XD It was a fun pattern though.

Would've taken me eleven years and a whole lot of pumpkins too. 

I LOVE IT!!!! +1000 cuz I main support and Thresh is a badass and a boss.
Belongs in the League art gallery.
Nice. Should have used a green glow sticks or green light for it though. Oh well that person did a great job.

> [{quoted}](name=Trinith,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bEPw8M3Q,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-11-02T02:52:31.098+0000)
>
> I gotchu bro. <3

This is where I'd post a jhin or thresh ok hand image but I'm lazy and got clean up to do so settle for "perfect."
Thanks. :D If it's still alive tomorrow i'll pop a couple in, i planned poorly. XD
